authors: Igor Vaynberg (Packaged by Jeremy Howard and Stefan Plattner)
description: A jQuery based replacement for select boxes. It supports searching, remote data sets, and infinite scrolling of results.
releaseNotes:
Changelog from 3.4.1

#1604 Add 'nextSearchTerm' function
#1601 Not working adaptDropdownCssClass callback.
#1593 Improve ES locale
#1591 Added Malay translation
#1584 improve PT locales
#1578 Colors to shorthand hexadecimal
#1574 select2-drop-above: dropLeft is missing some px
#1573 Setting option with empty value to selected=selected will not select it by default
#1571 add zepto compatibiliy
#1566 translation for Persian(Farsi) fa.
#1562 .select2('data', falsyValue) triggers change event when 3rd optional parameter is not supplied
#1557 width: copy option needs to ignore min-width and max-width
#1555 Fixed Tab key not respecting opts.selectOnBlur
#1549 Added !important to select2-offscreen to make sure that it is definitly hidden.
#1544 "autocapitalize" attribue is spelled wrong
#1540 Horizontal Scroll Issue with pages that have horizontal overflow
#1537 fixes #1536
#1530 When select2 is applied to hidden input and multi-mode is enabled, triggerChange option of "val" method causes error
#1529 Add Thai Translation
#1522 Improved docs for placeholder option #155
#1513 MultiSelect, closeOnSelect:false - Jumps to top of list each selection
#1497 First empty-valued option displays as "undefined"?
#1492 Bulgarian translation added
#1490 Rename component.json to bower.json (component.json is deprecated")
#1489 semicolon syntax error on compress
#1486 Added select2-loaded event trigger in loadMoreIfNeeded
#1485 Trimming in opts.createSearchChoice
#1478 select2("val") don't working with multiple elements
#1477 Update select2.css
#1474 Ignore old queries, remove highlight when beginning a new query.
#1472 Add support for diacritics
